parse.title: Monkey Zombie

For the monkeys during the final Wild Weekend, see Zombie monkey.

Monkey zombies are encountered during Monkey Madness in the Ape Atoll Dungeon. They drop zombie monkey bones that are needed to make a Zombie greegree.

The level 72 and 75 monkey zombies can be found in the Temple of Marimbo Dungeon. The level 72 zombies are much smaller than the others, and the size of the monkey that the greegree transforms the player into depends on the size of the monkey that the bones were obtained from.

There are also level 77 monkey zombies located in the inaccessible room under the Marimbo Temple, and in Ape Atoll Dungeon along with the Skeleton monkeys.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Training
  • 3 Drops
    • 3.1 100% drop
    • 3.2 Tertiary drops
    • 3.3 Universal drops
  • 4 Update history

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Ape Atoll Dungeon77None30Maplink
Temple of Marimbo Dungeon72, 75None41Maplink

Training[edit | edit source]

If you have a high enough prayer and combat level, these monsters can be used for training. With a high prayer level and combat level, you can get around 100,000 experience per hour. Use prayer, and when you are out run upstairs and use the altar. Make sure, however, to become a monkey using a greegree or you will be trapped by the larger monkeys up the ladder. An alternative to training here would be to bring prayer-boosting gear and use prayer potions, getting rid of the need to go upstairs and avoid the monkey guards. Remember to bring Salve amulet or Salve amulet (e), as they are undead.

  2. ^ Only dropped by 75,77 version.

Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Monkey paw1Always[d 1]11
  1. ^ Only during Rag and Bone Man.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable
Mimic kill token (m)11/10,00079,184Not alchemisable

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 17 April 2023 (Update):
    • Fixed the issue of incorrect souls being captured by Ushabti.
  • patch 11 April 2023 (Update):
    • Updated Undead Slayer categories gamewide.
  • patch 15 September 2010 (Update):
    • Stopped a zombie monkey from walking up a wall. (Bad zombie monkey, bad!)
  • update 6 December 2004 (Update):
    • Added to game.
